Features

  • Break Enforcement: New Break Management section with three modes to choose from - Flexible, Mindful, and Committed - allowing you to customize how strictly breaks are enforced

Improvements

  • Replaced double-Esc functionality on break screen with Tab and Enter navigation for better accessibility
  • Enhanced dark mode readability for notification colors and assigned exercise cards
  • Added video detection support for Perplexity Comet browser

View release preview on GitHub
